content.raw: I don't yet know why it seems that ogre rendering is slowing down physics. This pull request doesn't address that issue, and it doesn't address the other part of issue #578. This pull request should have little to no performance improvement on typical usage of Gazebo. This is just a nice feature to have, and the proper way to implement local publication of messages.
